StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [M8412_Create_Person_View]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @MonthBeginDate date.me SET @MonthBeginDate = getdate() -- get current date
SELECT p.PERSON_ID, p.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER, p.FIRST_NAME, p.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, p.LAST_NAME, p.SUFFIX_CD, p.USER_LOGIN, p.UPDATE_DATE, r.ORGANIZATION_ID INTO dbo.M8412_Person_View FROM PERSON p INNER JOIN RECRUITING_PERSON r on r.recrui.ng_person_id=p.person_id INNER JOIN MARINE m on r.recrui.ng_person_id = m.marine_id WHERE (r.TOUR_END_DATE IS NULL OR (DATEDIFF(MONTH, @MonthBeginDate, r.TOUR_END_DATE) >= 0)) AND m.PRIMARY_MOS='8412' AND m.PRESENT_GRADE_CODE LIKE 'E%'
INSERT INTO dbo.M8412_Person_View SELECT p.PERSON_ID, p.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER, p.FIRST_NAME, p.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, p.LAST_NAME, p.SUFFIX_CD, p.USER_LOGIN, p.UPDATE_DATE, r.ORGANIZATION_ID FROM INTENDED_MOS i inner join PERSON p on i.marine_id = p.person_id INNER JOIN RECRUITING_PERSON r on r.recrui.ng_person_id=p.person_id INNER JOIN MARINE m on r.recrui.ng_person_id = m.marine_id WHERE (r.TOUR_END_DATE IS NULL or (DATEDIFF(MONTH, @MonthBeginDate, r.TOUR_END_DATE) >= 0)) AND m.PRIMARY_MOS <> '8412' AND m.PRESENT_GRADE_CODE LIKE 'E%' AND i.marine_id not in (select person_id from M8412_person_view)
SET NOCOUNT OFF
